Description:
Detects that a vulnerable Netlogon secure channel connection was allowed, which could be an indicator of CVE-2020-1472.

Author: NVISO
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Vulnerable Netlogon Secure Channel Connection Allowed
Query: sourcetype='windows-system' eql select * from _source_ where provider_name = 'netlogon' and eventid = '5829'
